query: Can you please generate a 3-day travel plan for 2 people departing from New York and traveling to Charleston from March 19th to March 21st, 2022? Our budget is set at $1,600. We require accommodations that allow smoking and should not be shared rooms. We have a preference for French, Mediterranean, Mexican, and Chinese cuisines during our trip.
